about_the_game:
In this co-op action roguelike create your own character and join with friends to take down increasingly challenging dungeons. Each run your character starts fresh and you must find unique gear and abilities along the way. Cooperate with your friends to cover the classic tank, healer, and dps, or go all in with your own style.

Precise 3D Action Combat


Time your blocks, strikes, spells, and dodges to overcome enemies and bosses alike. Responsive controls are the cornerstone of Aetherift and make for easy to pick up but hard to master gameplay.

Fresh Builds Every Run


Coordinate with your party to build powerful synergies and cover your weaknesses.

Take on Dungeon End Bosses


Every dungeon has a signature end boss that will test the party's skills, builds, and coordination. You may have progressed smoothly through the run but don't let your guard down until the final boss has fallen...

Not all bosses are as straight forward as they seem, come back with different builds and stronger gear to test your mettle.

short_description: A difficult co-op dungeon running roguelike for 2-10 players. Gear up and defeat challenging bosses with action combat and team based tactics. Build your character however you like, from nimble tanks to heavy mages.
